SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.or_due_dte,'%Y-%m-%d') AS or_due_dte, a.or_due_place, c.ac_code, c.ac_name, c.ac_tel FROM sm_orders a JOIN sm_estimate b ON a.es_idx = b.es_idx JOIN sm_account c ON b.a_idx = c.ac_code WHERE or_idx = #{orIdx}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sm_orders WHERE or_idx = #{orIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sm_delivery ( de_idx, or_idx, ac_code, de_name, de_dte, de_chk_manager, de_chk_ac_manager, de_chk_dte, de_state, de_note, de_reg_dte, de_reg_mem ) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT('DE', LPAD((SELECT (SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(a.de_idx),0) FROM sm_delivery a),'[a-z]','')))+1,10,0))), #{orIdx}, #{acCode}, #{deName}, #{deDte}, #{deChkManager}, #{deChkAcManager}, #{deChkDte}, #{deState}, #{deNote}, NOW(), #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.de_idx, a.or_idx, a.ac_code, a.de_name, a.de_dte, a.de_chk_manager, a.de_chk_ac_manager, a.de_chk_dte, a.de_note, a.de_state, b.or_name, b.or_money, b.or_due_dte, b.or_due_place, c.ac_name, c.ac_tel, c.ac_addr1 FROM sm_delivery a JOIN sm_orders b ON a.or_idx = b.or_idx JOIN sm_account c ON a.ac_code = c.ac_code WHERE de_idx = #{deIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE sm_delivery SET de_name = #{deName}, de_dte = #{deDte}, de_chk_manager = #{deChkManager}, de_chk_ac_manager = #{deChkAcManager}, de_chk_dte = #{deChkDte}, de_note = #{deNote}, de_state = #{deState}, de_edt_dte = NOW(), de_edt_mem = #{userId} WHERE de_idx = #{deIdx}
